mean_cn: n.自解语症（只有自己懂的语言），自语症
mean_en: a condition in which words are so poorly articulated that speech is either unintelligible or appears to be a made-up language
sentence: They talk in an idioglossia that no-one else understands.
sentence_trans: 他们说的只有自己懂的语言。
word_etyma: idio个人的+ gloss引申为“词语” +  ia名词后缀：病症 → idioglossia 自语症
